title: Exploring Science and Religion with Richard Dawkins
description: Neil deGrasse Tyson discusses science and religion with evolutionary biologist Richard Dawkins. Eugene Mirman hosts, with guest Reverend James Martin. Plus, Bill Nye rants about rocks and evolution.
author: feed@startalkradio.net (Neil deGrasse Tyson)
